Job Position: Inventory Officer
Job Location:&nbsp;Durumi, Abuja (FCT)

Summary


	The Supermarket is seeking a detail-oriented, organized, and proactive Inventory Officer to join their growing team!
	As the Inventory Officer, you will be responsible for monitoring stock levels, updating inventory records, and ensuring accurate stock control to support smooth supermarket operations.


Key Responsibilities


	Maintain accurate records of incoming and outgoing stock
	Conduct regular physical stock counts and reconcile with records
	Monitor stock levels and alert management of low or excess items
	Prevent stock losses through proper documentation and control
	Assist with inventory audits and reporting
	Collaborate with procurement and store floor staff


Requirements


	Minimum of OND/HND/BSc in any relevant field
	At least 1 year of experience in inventory or stock management (retail or supermarket experience is an advantage)
	Strong attention to detail and accuracy
	Good knowledge of Microsoft Excel or inventory software
	Honest, disciplined, and highly organized.


What We Offer


	Salary: N100,000 - N120,000 Monthly.
	Supportive work environment
	Opportunity to grow within a reputable retail brand
	Staff discounts and performance bonuses (where applicable)


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;lasadshola@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

        Lasad Ventures, a retail company is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Inventory Officer
Job Location: Durumi, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	The Supermarket is seeking a detail-oriented, organized, and proactive Inventory Officer to join their growing team!
	As the Inventory Officer, you will be responsible for monitoring stock levels, updating inventory records, and ensuring accurate stock control to support smooth supermarket operations.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Maintain accurate records of incoming and outgoing stock
	Conduct regular physical stock counts and reconcile with records
	Monitor stock levels and alert management of low or excess items
	Prevent stock losses through proper documentation and control
	Assist with inventory audits and reporting
	Collaborate with procurement and store floor staff


Requirements


	Minimum of OND/HND/BSc in any relevant field
	At least 1 year of experience in inventory or stock management (retail or supermarket experience is an advantage)
	Strong attention to detail and accuracy
	Good knowledge of Microsoft Excel or inventory software
	Honest, disciplined, and highly organized.


What We Offer


	Salary: N100,000 - N120,000 Monthly.
	Supportive work environment
	Opportunity to grow within a reputable retail brand
	Staff discounts and performance bonuses (where applicable)


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: lasadshola@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: For more enquiries, contact via WhatsApp: 08107005245.

title: Job Openings at Trinity Financial
content:
Trinity Financial is a limited liability company duly incorporated in Nigeria under the 2002 Companies and Allied Matters Act. licensed and supervised by the Central Bank of Nigeria as a full-fledged Financial Service Firm.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Human Resources (HR) Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
     

            
    




	Candidates should possess B.Sc Degrees in IRPM or any related course with 5+ years of relevant experience in this field
	Must be conversant with Computer
	Female Preferably
	Must reside in Surulere, Island and its environs.


Salary
N250,000 - N400,000 / month.

Application Closing Date: 22nd August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: consultomr@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Marketing Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	We are urgently in need of vibrant and intelligent Female Fresh Graduates to occupy the role of a Marketer.
	With a minimum of 1 year of experience or zero experience as there would also be an intense training regarding this role for qualified applicants
	B.Sc in Accounting or related fields
	Must reside within Lekki, Ajah or Surulere.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 22nd August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: consultomr@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Head of Marketing

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Department: Marketing
Reports To: Business Development Manager & Chief Executive Officer

Brief Summary of Job


	We are in need of a seasoned and well-experienced Head of Marketing, who will supervise the team, lead, and facilitate all marketing activities within the company.
	The Head of Marketing is responsible for leading and executing the company’s overall marketing strategy to drive brand awareness, customer acquisition, engagement, and revenue growth.
	This role involves overseeing a high-performing marketing team, managing the marketing budget, and ensuring alignment between marketing initiatives and business goals.


Key Job Description


	Evaluating the creditworthiness of potential customers.
	Creating credit scoring models for risk assessments.
	Approving and rejecting loans based on available data
	Calculating and setting loan interest rates
	Negotiating the terms of the loan with new clients
	Ensuring all loans and lending procedures comply with regulations
	Maintaining records of all company loans.
	Monitoring loan payments and bad debts.
	Reviewing and updating the company’s credit policy.
	Strategic Leadership
	Develop and implement comprehensive marketing strategies aligned with business objectives.
	Identify new market opportunities and lead market research initiatives.
	Define and track KPIs for marketing performance and ROI.
	Team Management
	Recruit, mentor, and manage junior teammates of marketing professionals.
	Promote a data-driven, collaborative, and innovative team culture.
	Provide regular performance feedback and professional development opportunities.
	Brand Management
	Oversee brand positioning, messaging, and visual identity.
	Ensure consistency of brand voice across all platforms and touchpoints.
	Optimize the company website and digital presence for conversion and performance.
	Product & Customer Marketing
	Collaborate with product and sales teams to develop go-to-market strategies.
	Oversee customer segmentation, lifecycle marketing, and retention strategies.
	Gather customer insights to inform product development and messaging.
	Manage public relations, partnerships, and sponsorships.
	Digital Marketing & Campaigns
	Lead all marketing efforts, including SEO, SEM, email marketing, social media, and content marketing.
	Plan and manage multi-channel marketing campaigns.
	Budgeting & Reporting
	Manage the marketing budget and allocate resources effectively.
	Analyze campaign performance and report results to senior leadership.
	Make data-informed recommendations for continuous improvement


Requirements & Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or a related field (Master’s degree preferred).
	4-8 years of experience in marketing, with at least 2years in a senior leadership role.
	Proven experience leading successful marketing campaigns across multiple channels.
	strong marketing portfolio
	Strong knowledge of digital marketing tools and analytics platforms (e.g., Google Analytics, HubSpot, etc.).
	Excellent communication, leadership, and organizational skills.
	Ability to work in a fast-paced, results-driven environment.
	Experience working in a financial or banking institution
	Familiarity with CRM and marketing automation platforms.
	Strong network within the job location and its environment
	A certification/license is preferred.


Application Closing Date: 12th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: trinityfinancialng01@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
